title: 2 Brits, Moroccan sentenced to death for fighting to defend Ukraine after 'show trial'
content:
1. 2 Brits, Moroccan sentenced to death for fighting to defend Ukraine after 'show trial'  New York Post
  2. Russian-backed separatists sentence three men to death by firing squad | USA TODAY  USA TODAY
  3. 3 foreigners who fought for Ukraine sentenced to death  Yahoo News
  4. It was only a matter of time before Russia took British hostages  The Independent
  5. Britons sentenced to death after ‘show trial’ in Russian-occupied Ukraine  The Guardian

localize.title: ウクライナ防衛のために戦った英国人2名とモロッコ人に「見せしめ裁判」の末、死刑判決
